import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { MDBBtn, MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBInput, MDBIcon, MDBCheckbox } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; function SignUP() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '' }) const handleInputChange = (event) => { // console.log(event) const {name, value} = event.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name] : value, [email] : value, [password] : value, [confirm] : value, }) } return (

Sign up

); } export default SignUP;
